price: Au utuangushie mbingu vipande vipande kama ulivyo dai; au utuletee Mwenyezi Mungu na Malaika uso kwa uso.
arabic: أَوۡ تُسۡقِطَ ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَمَا زَعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفًا أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ قَبِيلًا
footnotes: Au mbingu ituangukie vichwani mwetu kwa mapande kama ulivyo dai kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu anatuahidi hayo. Au utuletee Mwenyezi Mungu na Malaika tukabiliane nao macho kwa macho!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aw tus'qiṭa al-samāa kamā zaʿamta ʿalaynā kisafan aw tatiya bil-lahi wal-malāikati qabīlan
